text: TITLE CARD: (This will be an image of the words keyed int the back of a Los Angeles public bus seat): MID 90’s CLOSE ON PUMA’S WITH THE FAT LACES PEDALING A BIKE RAPIDL

WE WIDEN OUT and see Stevie riding his bike through the P area of Los Angeles. He has his headphones on and a mid 9 Hip Sop song plays. He is wearing an oversized white T-sh and baggy jeans. He gently nods his head to the song. We pass by liquor stores, auto body shops, taco trucks, a store called ULTIMATE that hasn’t yet opened for the day. He continues to nod his head and ride his bike when ALL O THE SUDDEN the song starts skipping on one of the song’s lyrics. It keeps repeating as Stevie pulls over and stops bike. He pulls out a beat up DISCMAN and handles it with extreme care like a priceless jewel. He is freaked out something is wrong with it. CLOSE ON DISCMAN as he shakes and hits the "play/pause" button rapidly. We hear breathi and the noise of the CD reloading and then ALL OF THE SUD the song kicks back in where it left off and Stevie is ri again, nodding his head.

Stevie rides up to PALMS MIDDLE SCHOOL. He locks up his b against a chain link fence. EXT. STAIRWELL —- LUNCH Stevie sits with his two friends, RANDON, 13 (an obese wh kid) & CHRIS, 13 (rail thin white kid with braces).  Revision 3. They sit in the stairwell. Stevie uses his shirt to clean Discman thoroughly. Randon and Chris playing with POGS, little circular paper discs that you stack up and hit wit metal "Slammer". The Pogs that turn over are kept by the person who threw down the "Slammer".
Randon gathers up all of his new pogs.
Fuckin' motherfuckin' cunt-pussy.
And the “special edition green pounder” slammer! Chris reluctantly hands the slammer to Randon.
That's my favorite fucking slammer! Fuck! I need a do-over.
No do-over’s! (smiling proudly) You’1l have a chance to win it back tonight. Chris stared daggers at Randon. Randon realizes he said something he shouldn’t have. Stevie thinks for a second.
Oh, are you guys hanging out tonight? Randon and Chris share an uncomfortable look.
Yeah... Randon is gonna sleep at my house. You’re welcome to come hang out for a while.
(sensing something is weird) Okay...
It’s just... my mom said I could only have one friend sleep over. Or Whatever.  Stevie takes this in. This clearly hurts him very much.
Oh. Beat.
I wish there was something I could do.

(this is hard to ask/almost pathetic) Could you, like, ask her again maybe? Like, if that’s not weird? Chris doesn’t know what to say. It’s uncomfortable. Chris Stevie uncomfortably avoid eye contact.
(very left out) Well...
Randon and I had already talked about it, like, Monday or whatever. Stevie is quiet. Hurt.
(very well intentioned) You should still come and hang out and play Pogs.
Yeah, and then just go home when it’s time to go to sleep or whatever? Stevie is hurt and can’t figure out what to say. silence.
(changing subject) It’s your turn. Stevie stands up and begins to walk away. Beat of  Revision 5.

Stevie unlocks his bike. He breathes in five times deeply grabs the chain link fence with both hands, doubles over RAMS the top of his head into it like a bull. He SMUSHES top of his head and part of his face as hard as he can in the fence until he can’t take it anymore. He removes his but keeps his hands interlocked on the fence. He smushes head until he exhausts himself.

Stevie rides his bike down the street, listening to his Discman, the batteries die and the song abruptly stops. H stops his bike to see if he can fix the music situation. hears the sounds of skateboard wheels rolling on concrete wood slapping on concrete and laughter and shit talking o teenagers. He turns to see what he is hearing. From across the street outside of the Ultimate skate shop Stevie sees RUBEN ALVAREZ (13, skinny Mexican kid), FUCKS (17, skinny black kid with a shaved head), FOURTH GRADE ( white kid with long hair and a flannel), JORGE SILVA, (18 handsome Mexican kid who looks like a real athlete), skat outside the shop. There is a boom box playing hip hop mus Ruben is on the ground with a bar of wax, waxing up the c The others are doing flip tricks and ollies and 180’s on sidewalk out front of the shop. The curb is done being wa and the skaters start riding up and grinding and doing bo slides on the waxed up curb. Some fall HARD onto the stre while others narrowly avoid being hit by cars. They are cracking jokes and laughing at each other’s expense the w time lovingly. Fourth Grade films them doing their tricks Stevie watches this whole scene go down. CLOSE ON STEVIE’S FACE WATCHING. CLOSE ON CIGARETTES BEING LIT BY SKATERS. CLOSE ON STEVIE'S EYES. Jorge lands a perfect nose blunt on the curb and lands perfectly. The crew of skaters goes nuts celebrating and slapping their boards on the ground. SLOW MOTION SHOT of the crew running up to him and celebrating his victory. Rubbing of his hair and bro-hugs continue in the slow motion celebration. Fuckshit shakes head like “that was dope” and can’t not give Jorge a poun Jorge tries to look at the playback. Fourth Grade whips t camera away.
Nuh uh. No peeking. No one sees anything ‘til the whole thing is done.
Come on! Stevie clocks this respect and affection between them.
(regarding Jorge) Don’t worry, you don’t wanna see that sloppy shit anyway, nigga.
Ha! You WISH you were landing that! Ruben laughs.
I don’t know what you’re laughing at? I only see you landing kickflips with one foot like a bitch! The crew laughs.
(embarrassed) I land ‘em on carpet every time. The crew lets out a “come on” noise.
Maybe we can have the city pave all the sidewalks with carpet for you, nigga! The crew all laughs. Ruben is used to this treatment.

Go back in the store and unpack the boxes of hoodies. Fuckshit playfully pushes Ruben into the store. Ruben run to do what is asked of him. The crew pays and leaves the store. SLOW MOTION of Stevie watching this. His face is filled w an almost smile.  7. The sounds of the skaters’ joy fades out as the sound of clinking of silverware against plates fades up.
You're eating too fast. INT. STEVIE’S HOUSE - DINNER TABLE - EVENING Stevie and Dabney are mid conversation. There is a third place setting with untouched food and a vacant chair.
(embarrassed) Sorry.
(without even thinking) You look sloppier than you are when you do that. Stevie feels shame. He puts his silverware down and sits straighter. Beat. Beat.
I haven’t called that guy Todd back. Stevie looks up. She needs him to listen.
Oh.
He’s nice and everything but I feel like a third date says A LOT.
Do you think you may like him?

He’s fine. He’s nice. I’m attracted to him and all. It’s just... I don’t know. I don’t have a lot of time as it is. And I like to spend that time with you. Stevie smiles and looks down. Neither of them realize the oddness of this dynamic.
You’re the only person I don’t get sick of. They both giggle a little. Beat.
How was school?
(uncomfortable/distraught sigh) I don’t know.
What happened?
I don’t know. Randon And Chris are having a sleepover or whatever.
(quickly/guilt provoking) Oh and you want to have a sleepover with them? I wouldn’t have cooked if that is what you wanted to do... So that’s what you want to do? (with guilt) That’s fine. Fine.
(stopping her) No. No. Chris’ mom said only one of them could sleep over and I guess Chris chose Randon or whatever. Dabney slams her fork down.
Stevie looks down.
I have had that little shit, no offense, over here so many times, How dare she make you feel that way?
It’s fine.

(sweetly to Stevie) It is fine. You know why? Because you and I are going to have so much more fun here than... Randon and Chris are going to have. It’s a good thing if you think about it, because we get to have an amazing night together. Stevie wants to say more about how this hurt him but, he swallows it. He eats more of his food quickly.
Slow down. Dabney puts his fork down and looks into Stevie’s eyes.
You get to watch whatever you want tonight. Beat.
(hiding pain) Yeah. We’ll have more fun together. She puts her hand on Stevie’s face.

(sincere) You don’t deserve to feel shitty. Stevie looks down and smiles with his face still in the p of her hand. Ian enters and breaks up this moment. Ian clocks this swe moment. He keeps it inside, but he clearly notices their affection for each other. They notice Ian enter. Stevie stiffens up and gathers some courage.
(very nervously trying) Hey. Ian doesn’t acknowledge Stevie. This hurts Stevie. Ian quickly picks up his plate of food and walks away.

(calls out to Ian) Do you want to eat in here?!  10. Ian walks into his bedroom and slams the door. Loud hip h music plays muffled through the door. SLOW PUSH IN ON THE DOOR VIBRATING. Back at the table Dabney looks upset. Stevie looks hurt. Stevie looks down at his food. He can’t figure out words say. Beat.

He’s just... (searching for words) So angry with me... (thinking out loud) I'm figuring all this out as I go. (a bit sad) I don’t know. Stevie feels uncomfortable hearing his mom say she doesn’ know what she’s doing. She clocks Stevie’s discomfort and lightens things up.
(where does the time go?) He turns eighteen this week. (beat. Cracks a smile) Benihana. Stevie almost smiles.

(very dead pan) Should be a blast. They both let out a little laugh. Takes the pressure off. WIDE SHOT ON THEM EATING DINNER. INT. DABNEY’'S BEDROOM - LATER THAT NIGHT Dabney lays in bed in an oversized T-shirt with a blank expression watching the 0.J. SIMPSON TRIAL on television. Stevie sits on the floor at the foot of her bed watching her. INT. STEVIE’S BEDROOM - LATER A JERKY BOYS PRANK CALL plays on the Stevie’s stereo over scene. “Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles” figures and Micro Machine cars are strewn all over the floor and desk.  11. A “Street Fighter 2” poster, an “NBA JAM” poster, a Bo Jackson poster, and a “DuckTales” poster hang on the wall “Dinosaurs” plays on a tiny TV in the background on mute. Baby from “Dinosaurs” hits the Father dinosaur with a pan Stevie stands in front of his mirror in his underwear. He examines the bruises on his arms and chest from his fight with Ian this morning. He stares into the mirror. CLOSE U on the bruises. CLOSE UP on Stevie’s eyes taking them in. He’s not sad or even angry. They’re badges of honor. Like soldier’s war wounds. INT. STEVIE’S BEDROOM - LATER Stevie hears the front door open. He looks out the window see Ian getting in his car and driving away. He BOLTS out his room.

Stevie bursts into Ian’s room. He doesn’t know how much t he has. Ian’s room is an OCD wet dream. So clean and fill with a teenage obsessive collections. Ian's room is covered with east coast hip hop posters (Na O.C., Brand Nubian, Pete Rock and C.L. Smooth, Grand Puba Gang Starr, etc.) and tons and tons of CDs organized perfectly in alphabetical order. Stevie delicately inspects them like an archeologist insp a bone. He notices the names of the albums and rappers. H pulls a pen and piece of paper from his pocket and begins writing down some of the names of the rappers. Stevie brushes his hand gently over the racks of hip hop He carefully pulls one out like it’s a museum. He puts it his prized Discman. He sits Indian style on the floor wit his back to camera nodding his head to the music. He is enjoying hearing this music so much. Learning who Ian is. Learning about the world of hip hop. HOLD ON Stevie from behind nodding his head. After a long beat, Stevie hears a noise! He scrambles to the CD he is listening to back in its case. He runs out o Ian’s room and into his room. INT. STEVIE’S BEDROOM —- CONTINUOUS He breathes heavy, almost hyperventilating. He is safe, b still needs a minute to calm down.  12.
Stevie approaches a FEMALE EMPLOYEE, 20, who is standing the “Hip Hop” CD aisle.
Excuse me.
How can I help you?
I need to buy a birthday gift for someone.
Okay. What’re you thinking?
He has really, really good taste in music. In hip hop.
(smiles) Okay. Stevie pulls out his list of rappers. She looks
He probably has all the good ones already. at the list and smiles at the cute-ness of it.
But if I could, like, get a really good one that he doesn’t have yet... that would be really cool. She looks up from the list. She has an idea. She pulls a off the rack and hands it to Stevie.
Does he have this? It just came out two days ago. Stevie looks and it’s “LABCABINCALIFORNIA” by The Pharcyd Stevie’s eyes widen and he smiles while looking at it.
(so excited) He doesn’t have this. I didn’t see this one. He doesn’t have it. (serious but excited) (MORE )
Revision 13.
Like people who know a lot about hip hop would like this? And you're sure it’s like, really cool?
(smiling) Yes, I’m sure.
(smiling) Thank you. WIDE SHOT of Stevie in line as he pulls out his chain wal and has barely enough money for the CD.

Stevie gets caught at a red light on his bike. As he wait for the light to turn green, he sees TWO TEN-YEAR-OLDS st squirting each other with Nerf Super Soaker water guns. S MOTION ON THE KIDS as they are having the time of their lives. Laughing. These kids are only two years younger, b they seem in a different stage of life than Stevie. He is snapped out of his reflection by seeing the skate c from the day before, skate by as a crew weaving in and ou cars. This looks like the coolest thing he has ever seen. They seem like such badasses, but they are all interconne even though they aren’t verbally communicating. They fly Stevie, leaving him alone. EXT/INT. STEVIE’S GARAGE - LATE AFTERNOON Stevie rummages through the messy garage. He finds what h looking for! His brother’s warped, old 1980s body skatebo The body of the skateboard is bigger, bulkier and “neon”- than the boards he saw the crew from the bodega holding a skating on. The board has a giant, neon Dinosaur screamin “cowabunga” on it. It’s cheesy as hell but to Stevie it’s beautiful. He rolls the board back and forth under his foot a few ti The concrete outside his house is smooth. He puts his foot on the board and pushes on the board sloppily with his other foot. He rides on it for a few fe then jumps off. He does the same thing again. He does the same thing... SLAM! He falls on the grass. He’s shocked, but okay. The grass kept him from really hurting himself.  14.

head_text.subj: QUICK FLASHES OF THE SKATE CREW SKATING ON THEIR BOARDS D

text: QUICK CUTS of Stevie pushing and rolling on his board. Sometimes he jumps off and sometimes he falls off. Stevie carefully puts the board back exactly where it was the garage. INT. STEVIE’S BATHROOM - LATER Stevie looks at himself in the mirror as he practicing a monologue very meticulously and nervously like Luca Brasi the beginning of “The Godfather”.

(muttering to himself) Hey Ian. I’m so sorry to bother you... I saw your old skateboard in the garage. I notice that you never use it... Hi Ian. I was thinking that maybe there was a trade that could be made for something of mine that you... Oh hey Ian. I didn’t see you there. I know MY stuff sucks but... Hi Ian... Stevie breathes out nervously. He clenches his fist. He doesn’t want to blow this.

Hey Ian. Sorry to bother you... Stevie closes his eyes and takes a deep breath. INT. STEVIE’S BEDROOM - LATER LOW ANGLE SHOT FROM THE FLOOR UP TO STEVIE AND IAN. Ian a Stevie stare into camera for a long beat of silence. Stev looks incredibly nervous and is perspiring. Ian looks int into the camera, thinking hard. A SHOT OF THE SKATEBOARD FACE UP ON STEVIE’S FLOOR.
How much cash you got?
I... I don’t have any...
Why?  Revision 15.
I spent it... on something...
(shakes his head) Fucking dumb fuck. (thinks ) I‘1l trade you for your Discman. Stevie’s face is confused and shocked. This is a massive Way bigger than he could have expected.

(very timid) Well. (beat/looking down) It’s just that... I use my Discman... all the time... or whatever... (beat/nervously looking down ) And mom got it for me for my birthday... and Christmas... or whatever...
(sharply) I don’t need to do this. Ian bends down to grab the board.
Wait! Wait! Ian stands back up.
It’s the one thing in the world I can’t trade. I’m begging you. Anything else. Literally anything. Ian thinks about this. We see in Ian’s face he is going t completely fuck Stevie over on this deal.
(icy) You don’t even know about music, anyway. This hurts Stevie. Beat.
Revision 16.

head_text.subj: STEVIE HANDS IAN 10 SUPER NINTENDO GAMES. ALL THE GOOD ON

text: “STREET FIGHTER 2”, “F-ZERO” ETC. STEVIE’S FACE IS ELATED

head_text.subj: WITH HIS NEW BOARD. HIS FACE SLOWLY TURNS TO CONFUSION OV
THE POSSIBLY TERRIBLE DEAL HE MAY HAVE JUST BEEN MANIPULA

text: EXT. STEVIE’S HOUSE - A LITTLE LATER Stevie obsessively practices on his new board. He can gli pretty much every time without falling off. Over and over over again. EXT. STEVIE’S HOUSE - THAT EVENING Stevie, Dabney and Ian exit the house. Ian, Stevie and Da wear their “fancy clothes”. The boys in baggy polo shirts baggy khakis. Dabney in a dress. Stevie has the CD he bou for Ian, crudely wrapped in newspaper. There are two cars parked out front. Ian and Dabney walk towards their own c Stevie gathers up some courage and walks towards Ian’s ca
(regarding the gift) I got you... He barely takes two steps towards Ian’s car as...
(sharply grumbles) GO WITH MOM. Stevie JUMPS BACK like a scared puppy. Ian hustles to his and gets in. Stevie slowly shuffles towards Dabney’s car disappointed.

Dabney, Ian and Stevie sit at a group table at Benihana w strangers filling out the rest of the table. A YOUNG WHIT COUPLE, 30, and AN AFRICAN AMERICAN MAN, 64, and his GRANDSON, 11. The BENIHANA CHEF is doing his thing on the grill. It is quiet amongst the three of them as they watc It’s an uncomfortable dinner. Stevie has the CD he bought the table with his hand on top of it.
(to Ian) At my eighteenth birthday party I was breast feeding you.  17. The boys say nothing. It’s an uncomfortable image for all parties.

(to herself almost) I was a baby who had a baby. Jesus, could you imagine if you had a baby right now? Dabney laughs to herself at how insane that seems and how insane it was at the time. Ian takes a deep breath. This subject matter strikes a deep nerve with him. Stevie is listening but more focused on the gift he has for Ian.
What’re you gonna do with your friends tonight?
(rushed/quiet) chill. Beat. No other explanation.
Sounds fun. The chef flips a shrimp tail into his shirt pocket. The couple and the Grandpa and Grandson smile and clap. Dabne Ian and Stevie sit in silence.

I got you a present. Dabney hands Ian a card in an envelope. He takes it. Rips open, doesn’t read the card, opens it, takes out the two twenty dollar bills and puts the money in his pocket and the card and trash on the table without ever reading the card. He looks back down at his plate. Dabney looks offen but not surprised.
(looking down/barely audible) Thanks. Deep breath from Dabney.
(exasperated) You. Are. Welcome. Ian.  18. Beat. Stevie looks very nervous. He is gathering up the courage to give Ian his gift. His heart is racing. He tak deep breath.

I... uhh... got this. Here. Stevie hands it to Ian. Stevie’s heart is RACING, he trie not to look to eager to see Ian’s reaction. Ian grabs the present and rips open the newspaper. He qui looks at the CD and with no expression puts the CD and th trash down on the table without looking at it again. With emotion or expression, Ian makes the slightest hint of a nod to Stevie in his direction. He shows no appreciation enjoyment of the gift. Stevie is CRUSHED. He swallows it the best he can, but th stings more than anything we’ve seen sting Stevie thus fa Beat.
(to Dabney/looking at his plate) How much longer is this?
(frustrated) Until we’re done eating dinner.
I want to leave.
(pissed) Well we ordered and I’m paying for this food, so you’re staying.
(shaking his head/looking at plate) Whatever. The chef scoops chicken and shrimp onto Dabney’s plate. S forces a smile to the chef then back to Ian.
(to chef) Thank you. (to Ian/muted yell) What is wrong with you? Ian says nothing and just stares at his plate.  19.
Why do you make it so difficult to be around you? Ian still looks at his plate.
Huh?
(aggressive to Dabney) Shut the fuck up.
What did you just say to me?!
I said: “Shut. The Fuck. Up.” The African American Grandfather uncomfortably tries to t louder to his Grandson so he doesn’t hear this argument.
(losing it) Just leave if this is so fucking miserable for you! You think we want to be here?

(serious and scary) You're a fucking BITCH! Ian darts up and leaves the table. Dabney flinches with a of anger and fear. She puts her face in her hands and let emotional grunt into her hands. Ian leaves the CD on the table. Stevie looks shattered. He just stares at the CD. to die. It is very unpleasant and uncomfortable with the other pe at the table and with the Chef.

(to the other patrons) Sorry. Dabney starts crying in her hands. Stevie consoles Dabney rubbing her back. HOLD ON A CLOSE UP OF STEVIE HOLDING BACK HIS OWN TEARS. WIDE SHOT of the uncomfortable table at Benihana with the strangers. Stevie is crushed. Everyone else in the restau is having fun.  20. HOLD ON CLOSE UP OF THE CD FOR A LONG BEAT.

head_text.subj: THE CAMERA LEADS STEVIE AS HE SKATES ACROSS THE STREET.

text: His face is determined and displays a nervous hardness. C pass as he dodges them, he stops short, lets them pass Th honk at him and then he keeps pushing. He gets to the other side of the street outside the shop. picks up his board and walks up the curb. He reaches the front door of the shop. He puts his hand on the handle. H takes a deep breath. He enters the shop. INT. ULTIMATE SKATE SHOP —- CONTINUOUS Stevie quietly enters the shop for the first time, trying be as stealth as possible. The door opens loudly. Stevie looks overwhelmed. We feel the energy of all the skaters we saw in the bodega filling the store, but we on see pieces of them sitting down in a couch area in the ba We hear them yelling, talking shit and laughing with each other. They are blocked by various clothing racks. Stevie walks through the store as quietly and incognito a possible. He sees a giant wall lined with SKATE DECKS (Girl, Chocol Flip, Hook Ups, Alien Workshop, World Industries, Plan B, Blind etc.). He notices how subversive the artwork is on the skate decks. He keeps walking. He sees another wall l with SKATE SHOES. On another side, he sees glass encaseme filled with SKATE TRUCKS, SKATE WHEELS and SKATE STICKERS He’s puzzled and not sure how all the pieces fit together walks through RACKS of T-SHIRTS and HOODIES that fill the middle section of the store. The voices of the crew grow louder as Stevie gets closer. Through the T-shirts we see Ruben, Fourth Grade, and Jorg sitting on couches and the floor surrounding a television The crew is watching a skate video and talking shit to ea other. Behind the couches is a work area, where boards are set u Fuckshit is behind the work area setting up a board for a YOUNG CUSTOMER. Stevie looks at all the cool boards on the walls. Examine all the trucks and wheels in the glass cases.  21. Walks back over to the T-shirts and pretends to look at t but really is looking at the crew hanging out. No one eve looks in his direction or asks him if he needs help with something. Stevie watches.
A baseball hat is held by a hand as money is stuffed insi by various hands. WE WIDEN OUT to reveal Fourth Grade hol the hat.
Ante up. Everyone pitches in for tape so I can film.
I just kicked in, nigga.

That was a week ago. And without footie, no one’s going pro around here, son. Greater good, yo. Fuckshit nods his head understanding. He pulls out a coup bills and tosses them in Fourth Grade’s hat. They all go to watching Plan B’s “Virtual Reality” skate video on the screen.
(fantasy mode) Okay, if you could go pro for one team, who would it be? The whole crew gets excited at this day dream.
Easy. Girl or Chocolate or Menace. Easy.
Chocolate or Menace for sure.

Fuck. Chocolate, yeah, that’s the one. Imagine you and me decked out in all Chocolate gear. Free gear they just send us on the regular. We'd have the whole crew decked out in all Chocolate gear. Fuckshit and Jorge smile. They’ve had this day dream befo  22.
I already know what the first graphic on my board would be: A sick illustration with me wrapped in the Mexican flag manualing the stage at the courthouse.
(super into it) So sick, nigga. So sick. He and Jorge give a hand shake.
I know what my first board graphic would be. The Tribe Called Quest album cover with all the rappers heads on it, but it would be our whole crew's heads on it.
That’s tight!/So Dope!
That would be so sick, yo. We'd never have to buy boards again. Free boards forever.
Whatever team we end up on. It’s us together. Fuckshit gives Jorge another excited hand shake.
(joyously) That's what’s up, nigga. That’s what’s up. The crew sits happily and thinks about this day dream.

Stevie is at a closer rack of clothes pretending to brows but is secretly watching the crew watch videos and talk s There are a few other DIFFERENT RANDOM SKATER KIDS are browsing and hanging out in the store. A classic intro to WU TANG CLAN song blasts on the stereo. SUPER CLOSE UP ON FUCKSHIT’S FACE AS HE PERFECTLY RAPS TH INTRO TO THE SONG. When the beat kicks in we WIDEN OUT. Fuckshit is standing rapping every word perfectly.  23. He is jumping up and down getting everyone hyped up. The is into it and laughing and playfully punching him. Stevi smiling and laughing at this infectious joyous energy.

Stevie is waiting by the glass case in front of the store with the stickers in them. He admires all of the amazing stickers. He sees a copy of Thrasher and Big Brother maga on the counter. He flips through them delicately. Ruben finally approaches Stevie.
Yo. Stevie is pretty stunned anyone in here has acknowledged let alone talked to him.
Uhh... hey. Uncomfortable silence.
Do you need something?
Oh. Uhh... can I have this sticker? Stevie thoughtfully and carefully points.
And that one, please? Ruben slides open the glass, grabs them and tosses them o the glass towards Stevie.
Thanks.
Two bucks. Stevie takes out his chain wallet and takes two bucks out
What grade are you in?
Seventh.
Me too. Where do you go to school?  24.
Palms. (nervous ) You?
Crenshaw. DING! Fuckshit walks into the store with a Subway Sandwic a clear Subway plastic bag. He walks by Stevie and sees t board he’s holding.
(very dry/subtly sarcastic) Cool board.
(not getting the sarcasm) Thanks! Fuckshit has already kept walking. Ruben smiles about the interaction.
Atight.
Cool. Thanks.

Later. Stevie leaves the store. Once he is outside he has a HUGE beaming smile. They acknowledged him. EXT. MAGAZINE STAND —- LATE AFTERNOON Stevie skates up to the magazine stand. He scans the rack through the fitness mags, beauty mags, and on the bottom right finally finds the skate magazines. He grabs a copy Thrasher, Slap and Big Brother. He pays the guy and skate off. EXT. STEVIE’S HOUSE - THAT NIGHT Stevie practices skating obsessively. Quick cuts of him riding back and fourth on the sidewalk. Turning, zigzaggi etc. He is sweating. It’s getting later and later into th night. Dabney finally calls him in from the front door.  25.

Stevie! It’s late! Come on! Stevie picks up his board and runs inside. INT. STEVIE’S BEDROOM - THAT NIGHT QUICK CUTS of Stevie taking down Ninja Turtle and NBA JAM posters and putting up his two stickers and tear-outs fro his skate magazines with scotch tape. His room is now thr quarters kid posters and one wall is all skating.

DING! Stevie enters the store. Unlike last time the store quiet and empty. He wanders towards the back, but no one there. As he gets towards the very back he hears noise co from outside the back door. He follows the sounds. The back door, which is half open, leads to a parking lot Partially obscured by the door, we see the crew skating. Stevie creeps outside with his board.

Stevie watches the kids skate. They’re attempting and lan some cool tricks as music plays from a ghetto blaster. Stevie sits on the ground with his back against the wall his board flipped up next to him. He continues to watch t tricks and commit them to memory. He spins the wheel of h board with his hand while watching. Jorge walks by and notices Stevie’s board.
(dry/sarcastic) Nice board, yo.
(elated/unaware of the sarcasm) Thanks! Jorge smiles, shakes his head and skates off. Ruben attem a kickflip and lands it with one foot as Stevie watches.

Fuck!  26. Ruben skates over next to Stevie, but doesn’t notice him. Stevie is subtly trying to make eye contact with the only person he’s broken ground with within the crew. Ruben pic up the bottom of his T-shirt and wipes the sweat from his eyes with it. He picks up a gallon of water from the grou and starts chugging. Late in his chug he notices Stevie sitting there. He takes the gallon away from his mouth.
(to Stevie) Oh, what’s up fool? Stevie smiles.
What’s up?
(frustrated) Skating like shit today, man.
